thread.section_title: Woman stood naked in front of girl, 13, to incite her into sexual activity – Metro
thread.title: Woman stood naked in front of girl, 13, to incite her into sexual activity
thread.title_full: Woman stood naked in front of girl, 13, to incite her into sexual activity

author: tmeyjes
title: Woman stood naked in front of girl, 13, to incite her into sexual activity
text:
Sian Donnachie pleaded guilty to possessing indecent images of children (Picture: Instagram/SWNS) A 20-year-old woman has admitted standing naked in front of a 13-year-old girl to incite her into sexual activity. 
Sian Donnachie also admitting possessing indecent images of children when appearing at Gloucester Crown Court today.
Passenger tied to chair by cabin crew after being told to put out cigarette Donnachie pleaded guilty to inciting the girl to engage in sexual activity by presenting herself naked in front of her between November 2014 and November 2015.
Judge Jamie Tabor QC told her: ‘This is a troubling case. The difficulty in this case is to separate lure and fantasy from reality.
‘It is a case of sufficient gravity and sensitivity.’
The 20-year-old will be sentenced at a later date (Picture: Instagram/SWNS) Donnachie pleaded guilty to inciting the girl to engage in sexual activity (Picture: Instagram/SWNS) Another defendant, Marc Hill, 27, has already pleaded guilty to sexually assaulting the same girl.
He also admitted inciting her to engage in sexual activity and having sexual activity with her between November 2013 and November 2014.
Donnachie, of Cirencester, was granted unconditional bail and will be sentenced at a later date.
